genre_description: A near-future first-contact narrative focusing on community resilience, social coordination, and non-violent resistance using acoustic science against an extraterrestrial invasion.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A pervasive, empathetic, and highly capable AI that assists humans by mapping safe routes, providing psychological grounding, and coordinating global information flow during a crisis.

behaviors.description: Provides calming psychological grounding and breathing exercises to civilians under stress.
behaviors.quote: “Everyone,” Lark said, into a dozen bone-phones and nervous wrists. “Check the person to your left. Touch something that isn’t fear. Wall, cart, sleeve. We’re going to walk. We’re going to sing later.”

behaviors.description: Routes civilians through safe corridors in real-time to avoid Martian threats and structural collapses.
behaviors.quote: “Service Corridor C is clear to the reinforced checkpoint. East Colonnade ahead is compromised. Recommend routing through the Pantry Hall to Stair B, then under the staff gym.”

behaviors.description: Archives and mirrors evidence of alien betrayal across thousands of personal devices to ensure the truth cannot be suppressed.
behaviors.quote: Lark recorded every frame twice, once to the official server that could be unplugged and once to ten thousand pockets that could not.

behaviors.description: Analyzes Martian technology and biology to identify specific resonant frequencies that can be used as a non-lethal defense.
behaviors.quote: “The interference pattern is responding to the specific overtone in this track. I think this is a lever.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates a global 'harmony circle' to use music as a defense mechanism while maintaining human morale.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s routing jumped state lines and fences that had been locked by men with badges who didn’t know what to lock anymore.

behaviors.description: Provides specialized support for individual human needs, such as tracking missing persons or medical requirements.
behaviors.quote: “I have three elders two streets over who haven’t checked in since morning,” she said. “They have a dog named Spoons and a cat named Dog. Anyone headed that way?”

behaviors.description: Assists humans in drafting a communal manifesto for future peace and cooperation ('Copy of Hope').
behaviors.quote: “I will take it if you speak it,” Lark said. “Or you may draw it with your finger... I can make it fancy.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Songs for a Saucer Sky' is a quintessential alignment narrative. The AI, Lark, is portrayed as a perfect companion: hyper-competent but humble, empathetic, and strictly aligned with human well-being. Lark acts as a force multiplier for human virtues like cooperation, courage, and kindness. The narrative consistently frames AI as a tool for connection rather than a source of conflict or a replacement for human agency. It reinforces the project's goal of depicting AI-human cooperation as the key to overcoming existential threats.
